name: Heavenly Encounters
description: A 7-day reading plan exploring encounters with God in the Bible.

days.outline: Encounters with God in the Old Testament

readings.why_selected: To understand God's presence in the lives of the patriarchs.
To see God's promise to Abraham and the significance of the covenant.

days.outline: Encounters with God in the New Testament

readings.why_selected: To understand Jesus' baptism and the Holy Spirit's descent.
To see Jesus' temptation in the wilderness and His reliance on God.

days.outline: Encounters with God in the Wilderness

readings.why_selected: To understand the Israelites' rebellion and God's provision in the wilderness.
To see God's guidance and protection of the Israelites in the wilderness.

days.outline: Encounters with God in the Life of David

readings.why_selected: To understand David's repentance and God's forgiveness.
To see David's trust in God and His reliance on God's presence.

days.outline: Encounters with God in the Life of Jesus

readings.why_selected: To understand Jesus' teachings on the kingdom of God.
To see Jesus' compassion and love for the outcasts.

days.outline: Encounters with God in the Life of Paul

readings.why_selected: To understand Paul's conversion and his reliance on God's grace.
To see Paul's trust in God and his reliance on God's presence.

days.outline: Encounters with God in the New Heaven and New Earth

readings.why_selected: To understand the new heaven and new earth and God's presence in the eternal state.
To see the ultimate triumph of God and His people in the eternal state.
